actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness

official_title: To prohibit a rental car company from charging a surcharge or fee in a rental agreement for a vehicle based on the residence of the renter.

summary.text: Prohibits rental car companies from charging a renter a surcharge or fee for a vehicle based on the renter's residence. Sets forth civil penalties.

titles.title: To prohibit a rental car company from charging a surcharge or fee in a rental agreement for a vehicle based on the residence of the renter.
